name: TP-Link Powered USB Hub 3.0 with 7 USB 3.0 Data Ports and 2 Smart Charging USB Ports. Compatible with Windows, Mac, Chrome & Linux OS, with Power On/Off Button, 12V/4A Power Adapter(UH720)
short_description: Faster Speed with USB 3.0: USB 3.0 ports offer transfer speeds of up to 5Gbps, 10 times faster than USB 2.0. This 7-port USB 3.0 data hub can instantly expand 1 USB 3.0 port to 7 external USB 3.0 data ports for keyboard, mouse, printer, hard drivers and other USB devices.

Smart Charging Ports: 2 Extra 5V/2.4A charging ports supporting 2.4A output specially designed for ultra fast charging. Charges most USB charging equipment, regardless of large batteries such as smartphones or tablets, or mini-battery equipment such as smart portable devices, at full speed.

TP-Link Charging technology intelligently identifies connected devices, automatically delivering the fastest charge to your smartphones, tablets or devices with a USB charging connector, minimizing charging time.

Protect Both Your Equipment and Your Data: UH720 has a sophisticated circuit design with multiple overheat, overload, overvoltage and short circuit protections. A built-in surge protector keeps both your devices and your data safe in the data transfer process.
UH720 supports hot-swap USB ports that can be safely connected and disconnected while the computer is on and running.

Plug and play: No drivers required for Windows 8.1 / 8/7 / Vista / XP or Mac OS X and Linux systems. Backward compatible with USB 2.0 / 1.1 and current transmission speed is limited by the settings of the connected device
Manufature's 2-year warranty and 24/7 technical support
product_description: TP-Link UH720 is a 9-port USB hub. 7 USB 3.0 ports can be used for data sync and 2 ports are dedicated for quick charging. It also come with a power adapter to provide robust performance and a power on/off button to conveniently turn on/off the hub as need. With TP-Link UH720, you can now transfer data at up to 10 times the speeds of the older USB 2.0 standards. Speeds of 5Gbps are a vast improvement over USB 2.0’s 480Mbps top speed. It is also backwards compatible, allowing you the capability of using USB 2.0/1.1 products if need be. UH720 is Plug & Play for Windows, Mac, Linux, Chrome OS and more PCs, no driver installation required. Please Note: 2.4Ghz wireless devices, such as wireless keyboard and mouse adapters, may not work in close proximity to USB 3.0 devices or hubs. Connecting to a USB 2.0 port is recommended. The non-charging ports are intended for data transfer only. They provide insufficient power output for charging. And the charging port are for charge only, will not work for data sync. Ensure that the adapter is connected before using this hub. And for best performance please connect it to the USB 3.0 port of your PC." Interface Available: 7 USB 3.0 Standard A 2 2.4A Charging Ports, 1 USB 3.0 Micro B

name: USB Hub 10 Ports, Multiple USB 3.0 Hub USBA Splitter with Power/Data Ports & Lights, 3.9ft Long Cable Multiport Adapter Extender for Laptop, Desktop, PC, Car, Xbox, PS5, Console
short_description: 10-ports at Same Time -- This pc USB splitter easily expands one of your computer’s USB ports into 10 ports, supporting all 10 ports to work simultaneously without any issues while maintaining a moderate temperature. It is plug-and-play, requires no drivers, and is easy to use. Say goodbye to a messy desktop

High-Speed Data Hub -- This 10-port USB splitter for desktop features high-efficiency USB 3.0 technology, delivering stable data transfer speeds up to 5Gbps. Experience high-speed transfers of movies, photos, and files in seconds. When connecting hard drives to transfer files, power the usb extender for laptop via the included 5V/3A USB-C port to maintain stable and fast data transmission.Ideal gift for photographers, gamers and professionals

3.9Ft Cable for Maximum Flexibility -- The USB extension cable is long enough to be inserted into a desktop computer under the table or a laptop placed on a stand, and the multiple USB adapter can be placed on the table for easy access to your usb devices. Enhances the convenience of both work and entertainment. And the USB multiport adapter’s cable is made of PVC with a thickened 4.5mm wire diameter, it’s sturdy, wear-resistant, and bend-resistant

Better Performance -- This multiport data hub adopts an anti-EMI interference chip, combined with oxygen-free copper wire cores and aluminum foil shielding, ensuring stable and high-speed data transmission. With overcurrent protection design, it keeps your devices and data safe. Ideal for office work and entertainment

Breathing Light & Portable Design -- The USB port hub equipped with a constantly lit dynamic breathing light. When used with RGB game console, keyboard or mouse, it instantly enhances the desktop e-sports atmosphere. It is highly suitable for e-sports, creative workbenches, etc. The body is only 1 inch thick and 0.19lb heavy, making it easy to put into bag or briefcase with your laptop while traveling and business trips

Wide Compatibility -- This USB-A expansion hub is compatible with devices with USB-A port, such as PS4, USB flash drives, keyboards, mouse, card readers, HDDs (hard drives), printers, cellphone OTG adapters, cameras, webcams, workstations, USB fans, USB speakers, USB headphones, and USB cables. And it works with macOS, Windows, ChromeOS, Linux, and more

name: Powered USB 3.0 Hub, Wenter 10 Ports 36W Powered USB Hub, Aluminum USB Splitter with Individual On/Off Switches, SD/TF Card Readers and 12V/3A Power Adapter for PC/Laptops/MacBook Pro/Air/iMac/iPad
short_description: ⚡【10-In-1 Powered USB Hub】 Wenter Powered USB 3.0/USB C hub with 10 USB ports and SD/TF Readers, could expand 1 USB port to 10 external USB 3.0 data ports for keyboard, mouse, card reader, hard drivers, USB Flash drive, printer and more. Meanwhile, the SD/TF card slot is designed to meet the needs of the customer to the greatest extent, which will be a good substitute that can easily help you arrange your home and office.

🚀【5Gbps Data Transfer】 WENTER USB 3.0 splitter supports ultra-fast data transfer speeds of up to 5Gbps, 10 times faster than USB 2.0, and is backwards compatible with USB 2.0/1.1 devices. You can connect multiple external flash drives, tablets, card readers, computer mice, controllers, and other devices simultaneously. Whether it's transferring large files or backing up important files, this Powered USB Hub is a good choice for fast and efficient data transfer.

📣【Universal Compatibility】 Wenter Powered USB C hub is equipped with a USB A to USB C adapter, which is compatible with most USB A/USB C devices and provides extended functionality. Plug and play, without the need to install any drivers, supports Windows XP/Vista/Win 7/Win 8/Win 10, Mac OS, Linux 9 and above versions, supports any USB 3.0, USB 2.0, USB 1.1, and USB 1.0 peripherals, maximizing the convenience for Wenter customers.

🔰【High-Precision Aluminum Material】The 10-In-1 Powered USB 3.0 Hub shell is made of aluminum alloy, providing better heat dissipation performance; Built in surge protector and supports hot swapping; The 12V/3A power adapter is UL certified and has thermal overload and short circuit protection, providing safe and stable usage conditions for the equipment and data of every customer who purchases Wenter products.

👍【Individual On/Off Switches】Wenter Powered USB Hub comes with Individual switches and LED lights for each USB 3.0 port, allowing customers to flexibly turn on or off specific devices as needed. Minimize the hassle of cable clutter while always ensuring a safe working condition for Wenter customer.

name: Powered USB Hub 3.2, LEINSIS 10-Port USB 3.2/USB C Hub (10Gbps USB-A 3.2 +2 USB-C 3.2 +7 USB 3.0 Ports) with Individual On/Off Switches and 12V Power Adapter, Aluminum USB Hub Powered for Laptop PC
short_description: 【Hybrid powered USB hub】Say goodbye to limited ports. LEINSIS 10-port powered USB 3.2 hub instantly adds 10Gbps USB-A 3.2 ports, 2 USB-C 3.2 ports, and 7 USB-A 3.0 ports to your laptop, desktop, gaming host and more. It's fully plug and play with no need for drivers

【10Gbps Data Transmission & Intelligent Charging】The USB 3.2 hub offers lightning-fast data transfer with USB 3.2 ports (10Gbp/s) and USB 3.0 ports (5Gbp/s), enabling you to effortlessly transfer high-definition photos, videos, and any files within mere seconds. The charging port of the USB hub powered provides a current of up to 2.4 amps for efficiently powering your smartphone, tablet, and more

【2-in-1 Cable】This powered USB c hub includes a 3.3-foot USB-A/USB-C cable, giving you plenty of length to position it wherever you need. The dual USB adapter is compatible with USB-A/USB-C/Thunderbolt 3 devices, such as M1 Mac mini, MacBook, iMac, XPS, Surface Pro and more. Additionally, the powered USB hub 3.0 with ac adapter works seamlessly with Windows 7 through 11, macOS, Linux and other operating systems

【Sturdy Design & Individual Switches】LEINSIS powered USB 3.0 hub boasts a high-quality aluminum housing with a sleek, glossy edge design that is both durable and visually appealing. Each port of the USB c hub powered has an individual switch with an LED light. With this USB 3.2 gen 2 hub, you can easily connect and disconnect devices by pressing the power button for one second

【Powerful and Secure】LEINSIS powered USB 3.2 hub comes with a 12V/2A power adapter, which ensures you get adequate power supply and stable data transfer during heavy duty use. Additionally, With surge protector design, the powered USB hub 3.0 can protect your devices from overcurrent, overvoltage, short circuit and overheating

name: Anker USB Hub, USB 3.0 Hub, 10 Port 60W Data Hub, with 7 USB-3.0 Ports, 3 PowerIQ Charging Ports, Compatible with MacBook, iMac, Dell XPS, Surface Pro, iPhone, iPad Air, Galaxy Series, Mobile HDD
short_description: The Anker Advantage: Join the 50 million+ powered by our leading technology.
Ultra Fast: 7 ports offer high-speed data transfer of up to 5Gbps. Get synced up in no time.
Advanced Charging Technology: 3 dedicated charging ports equipped with Anker-exclusive PowerIQ deliver the fastest possible charge of up to 2.1 amps per port.
Compact Power: 60W packed into a device the size of a pen case. Simultaneously charge multiple devices while conserving space.
What You Get: Anker 60W 10-Port USB 3.0 Data Hub, 12V / 5A AC power adapter, 2.6ft. USB 3.0 cable, welcome guide, our worry-free 18-month warranty and friendly customer service.
product_description: 10-Port USB Hub The Massive High-Speed Charging Data Hub From ANKER, the Choice of 50 Million+ Happy Users • Industry-Leading Technology • 18-Month Warranty • 99% Positive Feedback Quick Sync Transmit data via USB at up to 5Gbps, fast enough to transfer a high-definition movie in seconds—no more wait times when sending and receiving important files. Charge Faster 3 PowerIQ ports detect your device's charging protocols to deliver the optimum charge at speeds up to 2.1 amps per port or 10 amps overall. Compact Power Only about the size of a pen case, this compact yet powerful data and charging hub won't clutter your workspace. A 12V / 5A AC power adapter ensures ports are fully operational at all times. 18-Month Warranty At Anker, we believe in our products. That's why we back them all with an 18-month warranty and provide friendly, easy-to-reach support. Supported Systems: Windows 10, 8, 7, Vista, XP Max OSx 10.6-10.12 or later Linux 2.6.14 or Later Compatibility: 2.4 GHz wireless devices, MIDI devices and some USB 3.0 devices may not be supported. Try using the host port or a USB 2.0 connection. The non-charging ports are intended for data transfer only. They provide insufficient power output for charging. Ensure that the adapter is connected before using this hub. Use official or certified third-party cables only. Do not use cables that have frayed, broken, or have exposed wiring. Data Port Output Current:5Gbps|Charging Port Output Current:2.1A
